allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix ESLint peer dependency conflict for Railway deployment

- Update eslint from ^8 to ^9 to match eslint-config-next@16.1.6 requirements
- Add .npmrc with legacy-peer-deps=true as fallback

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Regenerate package-lock.json for ESLint 9

Syncs lock file with updated package.json dependencies.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Regenerate package-lock.json with legacy-peer-deps

Fixes typescript-eslint peer dependency conflict for Railway deployment.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix TypeScript error in NextAuth authorize function

Cast subscriptionTier to SubscriptionTier type to satisfy NextAuth User type.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
